data.name: Arjuna Natural
data.description: Arjuna Natural is an innovative, science-based organization specializing in nature-based extracts for Health and sustainable living. We are a vertically integrated manufacturer, producing branded clinically proven extracts along with a wide variety of commodity botanical extracts, colors, fish oil, and natural preservatives.

data.name: BCM-95® Curcugreen
data.description: BCM-95 is our 100% pure turmeric extract that boasts enhanced bio-efficacy. It is manufactured by combining curcumin with turmeric essential oil specially enriched to 45% Ar-turmerone (another active turmeric extract). It has been researched in many human clinical studies and other models for its powerful inflammatory response, anti-oxidant properties, mood and cognitive support abilities among many other health benefits. BCM-95 composition makes it the world’s most natural turmeric extract, with free curcumin scientifically proven to be retained in the bloodstream even after 8 hours. The ‘95’ in its name represents the patented composition of this potent 95% standardized curcumin-essential oil complex (CEC). BCM-95 is the only extract that is FDA GRAS-affirmed.

data.name: Oxystorm
data.description: Oxystorm is the world’s first nitrate enriched extract of Amaranthus, one of the highest dietary sources of nitrates. It helps boost nitric oxide, the essential molecule that aids various integral functions in the human body. Oxystorm helps reduce fatigue and maintains an optimum level of functioning, especially during hypoxia conditions (oxygen deficiency) by supplying nitric oxide. It also provides more nitric oxide as compared to conventional sources like beetroot. In fact, many sports nutrition foods available in the market today, including beetroot juice, are not sugar free and also lack minerals like potassium which are required to compensate the minerals lost through sweat during exercise. This is a 100% water soluble extract and is perfect to adapting into a variety of formats.

data.name: Shoden
data.description: Shoden is a clinically-tested, purified extract derived from the Ashwagandha plant. Using a proprietary process, the full spectrum of Withanolide Glycosides’ (the bio-active component in Ashwagandha) in Shoden is enriched and optimised to an industry leading level of 35%. This is by far the highest composition compared to any other Ashwagandha root extracts in the market. Thus, Shoden offers guaranteed activity even at low doses. It is also the world’s most potent Ashwagandha extract and is supported by extensive clinical studies.

data.name: Ellagirush
data.description: Ellagirush® is our strandardised extract of the pomegranate fruit. Pomegranate (Punica granatum, Punicaceae) is native to Persia and is widely accepted in Ayurvedic treatment in India. It is proven to provide powerful cardiovascular and prostate health support in addition to being a potent antioxidant.

data.name: TRI-LOW
data.description: Tri-Low is the full spectrum extract of the bioactive ingredients found in the Indian gooseberry or Amla (Emblica Officinalis). This fruit is a superior cardiac health supplement and has been traditionally used to restore health, immunity and vitality. Tri-Low is standardised with ALA bound diacyl glycerol and preserves the stable natural form of vitamin C. It’s proven to be safe by toxicity studies and has rigorous clinical research that supports its cardiac health benefits. These include the reduction of bad cholesterol (LDL-C), total cholesterols, ApoB-ApoA1 ratio and intima media thickening. It also improves good cholesterol (HDL-C) and regulates triglycerides levels.

data.name: Rhuleave-K
data.description: Rhuleave-K™ is created using natural bioactives from turmeric, Boswellia and more, Rhuleave-K is our proprietary formula designed to deliver instant pain relief and reduce inflammation. It does so by using our patented SPEEDTECH which creates a powerful combination that retains the efficacy of its components. This technology uniformly distributes its components by using a unique matrix formula to achieve accurate filled weight and faster action.

data.name: AMLAMAX
data.description: AMLAMAX® line of products include natural and additive-free powder extracts made from fruit products. It is free of major allergens, non-irradiated, and contains no BSE, TSE, or ethylene oxide. These powders are also gluten-free, non-toxic, and vegan, making it suitable for a variety of dietary needs. This is certified with kosher, halal, and biodegradable.

data.name: Herbagut
data.description: Herbagut brings together the power of 14 different herbs to improve overall digestive health and immunity. It is a clinically proven, poly botanical extract that keeps the gut healthy by maintaining the integrity of its internal lining. This multi-herb blend draws inspiration from the Ayurvedic literature Sharangdhar Samhita which highlights the concept of poly herbal formulations to achieve greater therapeutic efficacy. Certain pharmacological actions of the active constituents of herbals are significant only when combined with those of other plants and are not evident when used alone. Scientific studies conducted at Arjuna have revealed that these plants of varying potency produce a greater result when combined as compared their individual use. The multi-pronged action of the poly-botanicals in Herbagut helps control multi-level gastro intestinal(GI) dysfunction that lead to irregular bowel habits, GERD, constipation, diarrhoea, bloating and related ill-health. It has been the leading brand in EU for more than 10 years.

data.name: Bospure
data.description: Bospure is a unique extract derived from the resin of the Boswellia serrata tree that grows in the wild. The tree resin naturally contains oils, gums and the medicinally active and fragrant, terpene group. The higher order terpenoids are collectively known as boswellic acids. They are the most active constituents of the gum resin, giving rise to a powerful remedy renowned for centuries. Our raw ingredient of AKBAMAX® is non-irradiated and its actives are safely extracted and sensitively quantified using HPLC instrumentation. AKBAMAX® is five times more potent than conventional Boswellia serrata extract and contains a minimum of 40% total Boswellic acid. The extract is a safe, cost-effective and biologically potent inflammatory response support with diverse clinical and formulation applications. It is clinically proven to be potent anti-inflammatory and anti-arthritic.

data.name: Ellagirush Pomegranate Extract (PFE-020)
data.description: Ellagirush Pomegranate Extract (PFE-020) is a high-purity, free-flowing powder with a long shelf life. It is a natural, non-GMO, and additive-free ingredient that is allergen, BSE, TSE, and ethylene oxide-free. Additionally, it is Kosher certified, gluten-free, and suitable for vegan diets. Our extract is derived from the fruit of the pomegranate tree and is perfect for use in dietary supplements. It is also non-toxic, non-carcinogenic, and biodegradable, making it an excellent choice for those seeking clean, safe, and sustainable ingredients. Available in pails for your convenience.

data.name: Bospure® Water Soluble (BSW-075)
data.description: Bospure® Water Soluble (BSW-075) is a natural, plant-origin powder with excellent water dispersion properties. This cost-effective, high-purity ingredient features anti-inflammatory properties and is non-GMO, non-toxic, and Prop 65 compliant. It is NSF approved, ISO 22000 certified, and FDA approved, making it Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). BSW-075 supports joint health and is commonly used as a dietary supplement in the nutraceuticals and supplements industry. Its granular dosage form makes it easy to incorporate into various food and nutrition applications.

data.name: Bospure® Boswellia Serrata Extract Poweder (AKBA-170)
data.description: Bospure® Boswellia Serrata Extract Poweder (AKBA-170) is a natural and non-GMO plant-based powder that provides joint support and anti-inflammatory benefits. This high purity extract is cost-effective and non-toxic, with excellent water dispersion. It is NSF and FDA-approved and generally recognized as safe (GRAS). Its granular dosage form makes it easy to incorporate into various food applications. Plus, it is non-irradiated and complies with Prop 65 and ISO 22000 standards.

data.name: Bospure® Boswellia Serrata Extract Powder (Ethanol Grade) (AKBA-170 A)
data.description: Bospure® Boswellia Serrata Extract Powder (Ethanol Grade) (AKBA-170 A) is a high-purity, water-dispersible powder derived from the resin of the Boswellia serrata plant. This natural, non-GMO ingredient has anti-inflammatory properties and is cost-effective, making it an excellent choice for food and dietary supplement manufacturers. It is also Prop 65 compliant, NSF approved, and has certifications including GMP, ISO 22000, FDA approved, and GRAS, ensuring the quality and safety of the product. Bospure® is an ideal ingredient for joint support and anti-inflammatory applications.

data.name: Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050)
data.description: Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050) is a food ingredient that supports nutrition and fortification. This phytochemical powder is free from major allergens, GMO, gluten, and is suitable for vegan and vegetarian diets. It has a long shelf life, is free-flowing, and is labeled as BSE, TSE, ethylene oxide, and non-carcinogenic. It is also biodegradable and certified Kosher, making it a versatile option for dietary supplements. HACCP-compliant, this powder is an ideal choice for nutraceuticals and supplements with a range of benefits to support health and well-being.

data.name: TRI-LOW™ (Amla Extract) (AMX-160)
data.description: TRI-LOW™ (Amla Extract) (AMX-160) is a natural supplement derived from amla extract, known for its high content of polyphenols and triterpenoids. This product is designed to support cardiovascular health and promote fat reduction. TRI-LOW™ is manufactured in compliance with GMP, ISO 22000, and FDA regulations, ensuring the highest quality and safety standards. It is also certified Kosher and Halal, vegan and vegetarian friendly, and free from gluten, allergens, and harmful substances like BSE, TSE, and ethylene oxide. TRI-LOW™ (Amla Extract) (AMX-160) comes in a convenient powder form and contains cellulose and silicon dioxide as inactive ingredients.

data.name: Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050 F)
data.description: Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050 F) is a natural and non-GMO plant-based ingredient that offers joint support and anti-inflammatory benefits. With excellent water dispersion and high purity, Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050 F) is a cost-effective food ingredient that is non-toxic and non-irradiated. It is also Prop 65 compliant, NSF approved, GMP certified, and meets ISO 22000 standards. Bospure® Water Dispersible (BSWD-050 F) is a granular powder that is generally recognized as safe (GRAS) and FDA-approved for use in various dosage forms.

data.name: Bospure® Granulated (AKBA-170 G)
data.description: Bospure® Granulated (AKBA-170 G) is a high-quality, plant-origin ingredient that provides joint support and anti-inflammatory benefits. This natural and non-GMO product is cost-effective, with excellent water dispersion and high purity. It is also non-toxic, non-irradiated, and compliant with Prop 65, GMP, NSF, ISO 22000, FDA, and GRAS regulations. Bospure® Granulated (AKBA-170 G) is available in a convenient granule dosage form.

data.name: Bospure® Water Soluble (ABW-075)
data.description: Bospure® Water Soluble (ABW-075) is a natural, non-GMO, and non-toxic powder made from plant-based ingredients that offers excellent water dispersion. It has high purity and is cost-effective, making it ideal for use in various food and dietary supplement applications. It provides joint support and has anti-inflammatory properties, making it a healthy option for consumers. Bospure® Water Soluble (ABW-075) is manufactured under GMP and is Prop 65 compliant. It is also approved by NSF, ISO 22000, FDA, GRAS, and the non-GMO Project, ensuring its quality and safety.

Using a proprietary process, the full spectrum of Withanolide Glycosides’ (the bio-active component in Ashwagandha) in Shoden is enriched and optimised to an industry leading level of 35%. This is by far the highest composition compared to any other Ashwagandha root extracts in the market. Thus, Shoden offers guaranteed activity even at low doses. It is also the world’s most potent Ashwagandha extract and is supported by extensive clinical studies.

Using a proprietary process, the full spectrum of Withanolide Glycosides’ (the bio-active component in Ashwagandha) in Shoden is enriched and optimised to an industry leading level of 35%. data.seo_description: Shoden is a clinically-tested, purified extract derived from the Ashwagandha plant. Using a proprietary process, the full spectrum of Withanolide Glycosides’ (the bio-active component in Ashwagandha)

data.name: Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 106 G)
data.description: Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 106 G) is a natural and high-purity ashwagandha extract that offers a range of health benefits. With active components called withanolides, this powder promotes antioxidant properties, reduces stress, rejuvenates the body, and stimulates the immune system. It is alcohol- and water-soluble, making it easy to use in various formulations. Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 106 G) is non-toxic and non-GMO and has been certified by GMP, ISO 22000, NSF, and the FDA, ensuring the highest quality and safety standards. Improve your sleep quality and overall well-being with Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 106 G).

data.name: Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 107 G)
data.description: Shoden® Granules (SH - PR 107 G) is a natural ashwagandha extract that has been carefully processed to provide potent benefits for your overall health and well-being. With its active component, withanolides, it helps reduce stress and boost your immune system. This powder supplement is also rich in antioxidants and rejuvenates your body. It is alcohol- and water-soluble, making it easy to consume. It has been manufactured in compliance with GMP, ISO 22000, NSF, and FDA regulations to ensure high purity, non-toxic, and non-GMO labeling claims.

data.name: Shoden® Powder (SH-PR 101 U)
data.description: Shoden® Powder (SH-PR 101 U) is an all-natural ashwagandha extract that promotes overall wellness. With its active component, withanolides, it provides antioxidant properties, reduces stress, and stimulates the immune system. It also improves sleep quality, rejuvenates the body, and is available in powder form.Shoden® Powder (SH-PR 101 U) is certified GMP, ISO 22000, NSF approved, FDA approved, and Kosher certified. It's made with high purity and ethylene oxide-free, BSE-free, and TSE-free ingredients, ensuring its quality and safety.

data.name: Shoden® Beads (SH - BD 101 U)
data.description: Shoden® Beads (SH - BD 101 U) is a high-purity Ashwagandha extract known for its withanolides content, which has antioxidant properties and helps reduce stress. This natural ingredient also stimulates the immune system and promotes better sleep quality. Shoden® BDS is GMP, ISO 22000, NSF, FDA, Kosher, and Halal certified, ensuring the highest quality standards. It is also free of ethylene oxide, BSE, TSE, and irradiation. Available in drums, Shoden® BDS is an excellent nutraceutical and supplement ingredient for oral drug delivery and care solutions.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application
1.DESCRIPTION: Knowde's turnkey application enables you to deliver an incredible customer experience on your website and turns it into a growth tool for your sales team.

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace
2.DESCRIPTION: Join the fastest growing marketplace for ingredients, polymers and chemicals. Get started for free!

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
